insert into t_theme (id, time, name, folder, main_color, aux_color, img1, img2, img3, img4, isWidget, widget) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auxColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iswidget,jdbcType=BIT}, #{widget,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_theme set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folder = #{folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_color = #{mainColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aux_color = #{auxColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img1 = #{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img2 = #{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img3 = #{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img4 = #{img4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isWidget = #{iswidget,jdbcType=BIT}, widget = #{widget,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, name, folder, main_color, aux_color, img1, img2, img3, img4, isWidget, widget from t_theme where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
